title: Inline Composer Fields and Copy
goal: Render bundle name and price inputs with clear required markers and placeholder price blocks inside the inline composer shell so admins immediately see the validation rules.
environment: HTML + Vanilla JavaScript + Firebase + Jest + jsdom

specs.title: InputsDeclareRequiredMarkers
specs.given: The inline composer form renders bundle name and bundle price inputs.
specs.when: Those inputs are declared in admin.html.
specs.then: Each input carries the HTML required attribute, mirrors aria-required="true", and points aria-describedby to #inlineBundleHelper so assistive tech hears the rule.

specs.title: RecommendedBlocksSeedPlaceholder
specs.given: initInventory mounts the inline bundle panel shell before any controller data populates pricing.
specs.when: The composer initializes its recommended and total price sections.
specs.then: #inlineBundleRecommended and #inlineBundleTotal show the em dash placeholder (â€”) so admins see stable copy until adapters provide pricing.

changeNotes: Stamped the inline composer inputs inside admin.html with required/aria-required attributes and kept em dash placeholders for recommended/total price blocks so jsdom tests reflect the shipped UI.
